tasks.description: Collect information and data about current AI Agent technology trends
tasks.system_prompt: Search for the latest information on AI Agent technology trends, including market growth, key players, technological developments, and common applications. Focus on current trends and future predictions.

tasks.description: Analyze the collected data to identify key trends and findings in AI Agent technology
tasks.system_prompt: Analyze the information collected about AI Agent technology trends. Identify patterns, key developments, major challenges, and opportunities in the field. Organize findings into clear categories.

tasks.description: Create a concise summary report of the key findings on AI Agent technology trends
tasks.system_prompt: Create a well-structured, concise report summarizing the key findings about AI Agent technology trends. Include an executive summary, key trends, market analysis, technological innovations, and future outlook.

tasks.description: Translate the summary report on AI Agent technology trends into Chinese
tasks.system_prompt: Translate the AI Agent technology trends report into Chinese, ensuring to maintain the structure of the original report while adapting appropriately for Chinese language conventions.
